info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 8:07AM CDT until June 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile AL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Alabama...
Bayou Sara At Saraland affecting Mobile County.
For the Bayou Sara...including Saraland...Moderate flooding is forecast.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Bayou Sara at Saraland.
* WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, street flooding east of the railroad becomes widespread. At 6.0 feet, flooding of residences in the area will occur.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM CDT Tuesday was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON
